nodes.text: "There's a lot of fire coming from the right side of that deflection tower"
- Garven Dreis during The Battle of Yavin

A Deflection tower was a shield generator found on larger space stations and planets, onboard the first Death Star, they helped generate a large deflection shield around the battle station, only allowing smaller star fighters to enter. Deflection towers where a primary target for Red Squadron during the Battle of Yavin, before attempting their bombing run on the Exhaust port

Deflection towers where mainly seen being used by the Empire, in place of the ISD-72x deflector shield generator dome which where seen on many imperial ships. Deflection towers took up much more room than the deflector shield generator dome, which where mainly designed to protect capital ships, This extra room allowed for more powerful shields with much more of range than standard shielding technology
Many such structures were found on space stations such as the Death Stars. They were often guarded by turbolaser turrets.
